## matters.Api.select() method

Opens a matter picker to select a matter. Returns the selected matter id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
select(): Promise<string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

## Example


```
const matterId = await sdk.matters.select()
```
